title: So when is Conqueror getting removed?
body:
Seriously though? It needs to go. Or at the very least remove the true damage on it. Make it magic damage so it can actually be countered with SOMETHING.

Edit: OR make it have a passive akin to Blade of Ruined King where the more max HP your target has you deal a % of it as magic/ad (which ever). 

If the stated goal is to have a counter vs tanks, fine, but don't sit there and tell me it's not murdering everything in it's path. Tanks should ALSO have a way to mitigate it with a build, just like damage can buy any of the dozen items for ignoring defenses are for.
